scene_description_enriched: A male figure, identified by the inscription "S. Simo" as Saint Simon, stands within an oval frame. He wears a blue tunic and a red mantle, both adorned with gold patterns. A golden halo encircles his head. He holds a green book in his left arm and a large sword in his right hand, its blade pointing upwards. The background features a red tapestry with floral motifs above a green and white checkered floor. The scene is framed by a blue border with decorative elements.
